thread.title: Alan Carr: Chatty Man
thread.title_full: TV | Alan Carr: Chatty Man - entertainment.ie

author: Fiona Flynn
title: Alan Carr: Chatty Man
text: Okay, if you have read the previous TV highlights you will know there is a bit of theme of Irish guests running through the chat shows tonight. It's no different on Alan Carr either where the fantastic Sharon Horgan will be on chatting about the much anticipated second series of Catastrophe, which she writes and stars in alongside Rob Delaney, who will also be on the show tonight. Joining them will be actress Catherine Tate who chats about her new film SuperBob, while musician Adam Lambert discusses his latest single and Irish singer-songwriter Roisin Murphy performs Evil Eyes. Oh look! Another Irish person! K, we'll stop now.
